a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Distribution of women's political empowerment index, 1789
Based on the expert estimates and index by V-Dem. It captures the extent to which women enjoy civil liberties,
can participate in civil society, and are represented in politics. It ranges from 0 to 1 (most empowered).
